definition: to stump sb with a question
to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

sentences.english: You got me by asking me directions to the Chaoyang Theater.
sentences.chinese: 你也把我問住了，怎麼赴朝陽劇院，我也不知道。

sentences.english: He was stuck by a question and felt very embarrassed.
sentences.chinese: 他被一個問題問住了，感到很尷尬。

sentences.english: She has bowled him out with that question.
sentences.chinese: 她那個問題把他給問住了。
